locale.name: en-US
locale.title: Baby Sticker Animal HD
locale.subtitle: Sticker Zoo
locale.description: This is an animal cognitive sticker game designed for children in the pad, including more than 100 animals, including birds, mammals, marine animals, insects and so on. Each animal has 2 language pronunciation: English, Chinese, children can know the animals in the process of playing sticker, hear their calls and see their cards. The real image helps your baby perceive the world through vision, hearing and touch. At the same time, let your children learn English with stickers, Chinese, fun and enjoyable. Children linguists point out that early childhood exposure to various languages, including different phonemes, will have great benefits for the development of children's language function.
locale.promotional_text: A good helper for baby's early teaching and cognitive learning

keywords.keyword: 3岁宝宝拼图,儿童游戏免费学英语,识图,爱,贴纸动物园,早教认知,海绵,幼儿学拼音,神奇校车,动物乐园,海棉,巧虎益智,词汇abc英语,颜色形状和,6,直映认字软件,做汉堡,酷跑,喜羊羊与,写汉字

locale.name: zh-Hans
locale.title: 宝宝动物贴纸HD
locale.subtitle: 贴纸动物园
locale.description: 这是平板上一款针对儿童设计的动物认知贴纸游戏, 包含100多种动物,涵盖鸟类动物，哺乳动物，海洋动物，昆虫等， 每种动物有2种语言发音:英语, 中文, 孩子们可以在玩贴纸游戏的过程中认识这些动物, 听到它们的叫声, 看到它们的卡通及真实形象, 帮助您的宝宝通过视觉、听觉、触觉全方位感知这个世界。同时让你的孩子边玩贴纸边学英语，中文吧，充满乐趣并且寓教于乐，儿童语言学家指出，幼儿早期接触各种语言包括不同的音素语调，将对儿童语言功能发展有极大的好处
locale.promotional_text: 宝宝早教认知学习的好帮手

keywords.keyword: 岁宝宝贴纸,学数字,儿童识字游戏,看图学英语,动物园,魔力小孩英语点读,认图形,少儿故事贴,爱学习,hooked,on,phonics,kids,动物,爸爸去哪儿2,写汉字,幼儿数学六壬,巴士大全免费
